00014 class Plugins_Linkedin_DB extends Common_DB
00015 {
00016     
00017     static protected $_message;
00018 
00019     /***
00020     * Constantes necesarias para el parseo del xml
00021     */
00022     const updateContent = "update-content";
00023     const firstName = "first-name";
00024     const lastName = "last-name";
00025     const currentShare = "current-share";
00026     const pictureUrl = "picture-url";
00027     const shortenedUrl = "shortened-url";
00028     const siteStandardProfileRequest = "site-standard-profile-request";
00029     const thumbnailUrl = "thumbnail-url";
00030 
00031     /**
00032      * @return void
00033      */
00034     function __construct()
00035     {
00036         parent::__construct();
00037     }
00038 
00039     /**
00040      * @param SimpleXMLElement $data
00041      * @param integer $owner
00042      * @param User_Accounts_Data $account
00043      * @return Message_Data
00044      */
00045     public static function save(SimpleXMLElement $data, $owner = 0, $account)
00046     {
00047         $auth = Auth::get_instance();
00048         $messageMapper = Message_Mapper::get_instance();
00049 
00050         $remoteIds = array();
00051 
00052         foreach ($data->update as $item) {
00053 
00054             $item = $item->{self::updateContent}->person;
00055 
00056             $user = array(
00057                 "id" => (string) $item->id,
00058                 "firstName" => (string) $item->{self::firstName},
00059                 "lastName" => (string) $item->{self::lastName},
00060                 "headline" => (string) $item->headline,
00061                 "pictureUrl" => (string) $item->{self::pictureUrl},
00062                 "profile" => (string) $item->{self::siteStandardProfileRequest}->url
00063             );
00064 
00065             $item = $item->{self::currentShare};
00066  
00067             $commnt = (string) $item->comment;
00068             $encoding = mb_detect_encoding($commnt, "auto");
00069 
00070             if($encoding != "UTF-8") {
00071 
00072                 $commnt = utf8_encode($commnt);
00073             }
00074 
00075             $content = array(
00076                 "contentId" => (string) $item->id,
00077                 "timestamp" => (string) $item->timestamp,
00078                 "comment" => $commnt,
00079                 "link" => isset($item->content->{self::shortenedUrl}) ? (string) $item->content->{self::shortenedUrl} : "",
00080                 "thumbnailUrl" => isset($item->content->{self::thumbnailUrl}) ? (string) $item->content->{self::thumbnailUrl} : "",
00081                 "description" => isset($item->content->description) ? (string) $item->content->description : "",
00082                 "title" => isset($item->content->title) ? (string) $item->content->title : "",
00083             );
00084 
00085             self::$_message  = New Message_Data();
00086             self::$_message->setRemoteId($content["contentId"])
00087                     ->setIdU($auth->getUserId())
00088                     ->setIdUP($account->getId());
00089 
00090             $existingMessages = $messageMapper->find(self::$_message);
00091             if (count($existingMessages) > 0) {
00092 
00093                 self::$_message = $existingMessages[0];
00094             }
00095 
00096             $link = $content["link"] != "" ? $content["link"] : $user["profile"];
00097 
00098             self::$_message->setTitle($content["comment"])
00099                     ->setPublishDate( date("Y-m-d H:i:s", substr($content["timestamp"], 0, -3)) )
00100                     ->setLink($link)
00101                     ->setData(array_merge($user, $content))
00102                     ->setOwner($owner);
00103 
00104             if (self::$_message->isValid()) {
00105 
00106                 $remoteIds[] = self::$_message->getRemoteId();
00107                 $mId = $messageMapper->save(self::$_message);
00108 
00109                 self::$_message->setId($mId);
00110 
00111             } else {
00112 
00113                echo "\r\n\r\nSomething happend:\r\n\r\n";
00114                print_r(self::$_message->getErrors());
00115                print_r(self::$_message->getOptions());
00116                continue;
00117             }
00118         }
00119 
00120         if(self::$_message instanceof Message_Data and count($remoteIds) > 0) {
00121 
00122             /***
00123              * Borrar mensajes eliminados en linkedin
00124              */
00125             $where = array(
00126 
00127                 "where" => array(
00128                     "messages.owner" => self::$_message->getOwner(),
00129                     "messages.remoteId >" => $remoteIds[count($remoteIds)-1],
00130                     "idup" => self::$_message->getIdUP()
00131                 ),
00132 
00133                 "where_not_in" => array(
00134                     "messages.remoteId" => $remoteIds
00135                 )
00136             );
00137 
00138             $messages = $messageMapper->customQuery($where);
00139 
00140             foreach ($messages as $msg) {
00141 
00142                 echo "Deleting Linkedin message with id: ".$msg->getId()."\r\n";
00143                 $messageMapper->delete($msg);
00144             }
00145         }
00146 
00147         return self::$_message;
00148     }
00149     
00150 }
